name: really nice adventure
description:
kill goo monsters to get stronger and bigger (purple make you smaller, but still stronger) and get points
when you get stronger, kill harder goo monsters for more points
the faster you go, the more damage you deal

CONTROLS:
1/2/3/4 and "b" on keyboard choose what monsters you fight
wasd to move
left click to make monsters
c to clear
t to change character

P.S. try pressing "n", "k", and "o"
